name: DeleteAsanaMembership
description:
Delete a membership in Asana.

Delete a specific, existing membership for a goal, project, portfolio, or custom field in Asana by providing the membership ID.

parameters.name: membership_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership.

parameters.name: pretty_output_enabled
parameters.description: Enable pretty-printed JSON format for a more readable response. Recommended for debugging, as it increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: membership_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the membership.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
